* This Samsung AR18CY3AAGC Air Conditioner image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Coated Copper Tube 
Enjoy a longer-lasting performance and save money. The Heat Exchanger’s coated copper tubes have 7.5x better corrosion resistance, protecting it against harmful environmental conditions, like dust and pollutants. It extends the lifespan, improves reliability and reduces maintenance costs. 

 
* This Samsung AR18CY3AAGC Air Conditioner image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary. 


Long-lasting protection, optimal cooling 
Triple Protector Plus 
Enjoy a long-lasting performance in challenging environments. Triple Protector Plus technology prevents damage from power surges and fluctuating electrical currents, without a separate voltage stabilizer. Its anti-corrosion coating also protects the condenser and cabinet in harsh conditions. 

 
* This Samsung AR18CY3AAGC Air Conditioner image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Samsung AR18CY3AAGC Air Conditioner image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

* This Samsung AR18CY3AAGC Air Conditioner image is for illustration purpose only. Actual image may vary.

Enjoy long-lasting cooling.
A golden hydrophilic coating is applied on the condenser coils, which protects the Kelvinator Air Conditioner from dust, water, salt or any kind of acidic accumulation on the coils. Cool more and save more.

iClean


With the iClean functionality when you press ‘iClean/Self Clean’ on the remote, the split AC automatically dries water and cleans dust particles from the coil.

Eco Mode

Turbo Mode


Turbo Mode cools your room effectively by operating at the highest fan speed.

iFollow


The Kelvinator Split AC senses the temperature around the remote and cools the air to reach the desired temperature when you press ‘iFollow/Follow Me’ in the remote.

VoltStabilize
VoltStabilize provides consumers with a stabilizer-free operation. Kelvinator ACs come with a voltage compressor that operates under a wide range of voltage fluctuations. So, even if your area is troubled with unpredictable electric surges and drops, Kelvinator ACs will always remain protected.
